recipesJson.name: Chocolate Kiwi Pop
recipesJson.author: zylonality
recipesJson.description: Chocolate covered Kiwi Popsicles. Something new but quite common combination when it comes to real life kiwis. Very thin chocolate layer. This is also suitable for the non chocolate vapers. Needs to steep to let the Kiwi get brighter and sweeter. Lime Wedge and Pear help to let the Kiwi shine even more.
